page.title: 09Clubs Around Grayshott
page.content: In{Grayshott}there are many{clubs such as{Path Finders, Sunday School, {Womens Institute (W.I.)}and many, many more.{Path Finders}is like{Sunday {School}but a lot more fun. We sing songs which surprisingly the boys like, we pray after singing, then we listen to a sermon type thing but it is much easier for us to understand than the sermon or talk in{Church. After the sermon or talk we have a game where the girls compete against the boys. Once we have finished this we are offered a drink and biscuits. Then we normally play a game like crab football, it is lots of fun.{Sunday {School}is sometimes all prayer and compared with{Path Finders}is not much fun at all. When I went to{Sunday {School}the only thing I liked was the story from the{Bible.
